skins.selfIntroduction: I am Mogami, nameship of the Mogami-class... on paper, anyway. After what happened to Mikuma and Nachi at Midway, I have no right to call myself that anymore... In any case, feel free to hand me your work, but just don't expect much.
skins.acquisition: Mogami, reporting for duty... Don't worry too much about me, just leave me be and I'll find my own place to crash.
skins.login: Welcome back. Huh? You want me to say it with more emotion? Sorry, chief. Not sure I can help with that one.
skins.details: Not saying anything makes you look cool? Figures... you would believe something like that.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wonder what Mikuma is doing right now... Well, I suppose there's nothing to worry about. She's not like me, after all...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Are you sure you want me to be your secretary? Just about anybody else would be better for the job. I'm serious... I'm not just saying that to avoid work.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Perhaps I should get Nachi to teach me how to be a little more cheerful... crap, hope nobody heard that...
skins.secretaryTouch: You don't have to remind me, I'll get the work done.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek!! Commander, are you seriously interested in someone like me...?

skins.shipDescription: Are you sure this is a retrofit and not some weird hazing ritual? I look... Well, I suppose I do feel stronger. Guess I'll try to work a bit harder. Wouldn't hurt for you to look forward to it a little.
skins.acquisition: Are you sure this is a retrofit and not some weird hazing ritual? I look... Well, I suppose I do feel stronger. Guess I'll try to work a bit harder. Wouldn't hurt for you to look forward to it a little.
skins.login: Commander, you're back. Huh? I just happen to remember what your footsteps sound like.
skins.details: I look even cooler now when I don't say anything? Whatever... have it your way...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Recently, Mikuma has been telling me that I have more self-esteem... Not sure about that one though, I don't think I've really changed...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Secretary ship duties? Well, I still think I'm not really cut out for it compared to the others... but if it's what you want, I'll keep doing it.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, be honest. What do you think about my new outfit after the retrofit? Um... if you like it, I suppose we can keep it like this...
skins.secretaryTouch: Maybe I should go practice using this naginata or something...
